ABOUT 
 

Nyumba Ya Wazee Elderly Home was founded by The Little Sisters of the Poor who are an international congregation of Roman Catholic women religious founded in 1839 by Saint Jeanne Jugan. 
 
 Our MISSION is to offer the neediest elderly of every race and religion a home where they will be welcomed as Christ, cared for as family and accompanied with dignity until God calls them to himself. We, take care of the elderly poor of all nationalities and religious beliefs, around the world. In Kenya we have established homes in Mombasa and Nairobi. In Nairobi, ”NYUMBA YA WAZEE” as it is called familiarly is situated opposite the Ceremonial gates of Kasarani the International Sports Complex (Safaricom Arena), between the Consol Factory and the SAFARICOM found next to Neema Hospital. We help one another in this mission with staffs who are employed and this chain we have also our friends who support us in all kind of ways.This makes us belong to one family all at the service of the less fortunate old people. We have to be little in our way of serving them.

HELP 
 
 HOW TO SIGN UP AND LOGIN 
 ● Click to register screen in the home screen 
 ● Enter your personal details according to fields and click register button 
 ● Once your account has been approved by the admin, you will be able to login into your user dashboard. 
 ADDING AN ELDER 
 How to add an elder 
 ● The family member is the one responsible to add an elder he/she wants to be admitted. He must enter details needed in the add elder screen. 
 ● Once the Home supervisor has approved the elder and he/she is admitted, the family member will see the caregiver allocated to the elder
